text: @realDonaldTrump You f'ed up the handling of COVID-19 which spoiled your plans to declare yourself a wartime president and ride that to the polls, so now you are trying to escalate tensions with - surprise, foreigners, so that your racist, bigoted followers will continue to support you.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
